description: Housed within the Bulgari hotel right in the heart of Milan and opposite an exclusive garden, this restaurant is run by three-Michelin-starred chef Niko Romito from the Abruzzi, who creates light Italian dishes with a contemporary feel. Trendy atmosphere and bar.
